title: Limited liability company liable for member's or
context: [ยง428-302] Limited liability company liable for member&rsquo;s or manager&rsquo;s actionable conduct. A limited liability company shall be liable for loss or injury caused to any person, or for a penalty incurred, as a result of a wrongful act or omission or other actionable conduct of a member or manager acting in the ordinary course of business of the company or with authority of the company. [L 1996, c 92, pt of ยง1]
